articles.author: Nike Ching
articles.title: US experts see Pyongyang's Russia gambit as no-win situation for China - VOA Asia
articles.description: China's response to Russia's growing influence over North Korea and its leader, Kim Jong Un, likely combines "exasperation" and "panic" as Beijing appears to be losing control over its client state, according to former U.S. policy and intelligence officials.…
